title: EU ping
body: So im an NA player and i have an account in EUW my ping is consistently around 130 every game and if im lucky i get down to about 120 ping. So im curious is there any ways to help bring the ping down to something reasonable? perhaps some settings on the computer? or something you download that helps ping? Would be cool to get some help and suggestions.

replies.body: If you're playing from the NA region, your routing to EUW is generally going to be pretty high.  An increase could be how you're getting there.  A [DNS configuration](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) may help by updating that routing, but keep in mind we can't exceed that physical distance to EU.
